name: Intro to Programming
description: Covers the fundamental principles of programming languages, syntax, logic building, and problem-solving through coding.

name: Programming Concepts
description: Focuses on key programming concepts including variables, control structures, functions, and data handling.

name: Data Structures
description: Explores methods for organizing and managing data efficiently through structures like arrays, stacks, queues, and trees.

name: Web Development
description: Provides an overview of website design, frontend development, and web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Database Systems
description: Focuses on database design, data modeling, and the use of SQL for managing relational databases.

name: English Literature
description: Covers significant literary works and explores themes, genres, and historical contexts in English literature.

name: Creative Writing
description: Introduces creative writing techniques with a focus on narrative development, style, and expression.

name: Modern Art History
description: Examines the development of modern art movements and their influence on contemporary artistic practices.

name: Photography Basics
description: Covers photography fundamentals including composition, lighting, and camera techniques.

name: Principles of Marketing
description: Explores the basic principles of marketing strategies, consumer behavior, and market research.

name: Financial Accounting
description: Introduces financial accounting concepts, financial statements, and reporting standards.

name: Business Ethics
description: Examines ethical issues in business decision-making and corporate responsibility.

name: Entrepreneurship
description: Focuses on business creation, innovation strategies, and management of startup ventures.

name: Introduction to Medicine
description: Provides an overview of medical science, healthcare systems, and patient care practices.

name: Human Anatomy
description: Focuses on the structure of the human body including systems, organs, and tissues.

name: First Aid
description: Covers essential emergency response skills for handling injuries and medical situations.

name: Clinical Skills
description: Introduces clinical practices including patient communication, diagnostics, and basic medical procedures.

name: Mechanical Engineering Basics
description: Provides foundational knowledge of mechanical systems, energy transfer, and applied mechanics.

name: Electrical Circuits
description: Explores electrical circuit theory, components, and practical circuit design.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Covers energy systems, heat transfer, and thermodynamic processes in engineering.

name: Control Systems
description: Focuses on system modeling, feedback control, and automation principles.
